text: Area codes 519, 226, 548, and 382 are area codes in the North American Numbering Plan. They cover southwestern Ontario, Canada, including cities like Windsor, London, and Kitchener. Area code 519 was created in 1953 as a split from 416. When the population grew and more phone numbers were needed, more changes happened: * split by 705 in 1957 * overlaid by 226 in 2006 * overlaid by 548 in 2016 * overlaid by 382 in 2023 ==References== Category:Area codes in Canada
title: Area codes 519, 226, 548, and 382
